short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send bulk SMS messages easily using Africa's Talking API. Perfect for businesses needing to send messages to multiple recipients.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Africa's Talking SMS Chrome Extension is a simple and efficient tool designed to help users send bulk SMS messages directly from their browser. By uploading a CSV file, users can quickly and easily send personalized messages to multiple recipients. This extension leverages the Africa's Talking SMS API to deliver fast, reliable, and scalable SMS services.
